snippet: How much power can one Yoda output? What happens if you tried to hit a baseball pitched at 90 percent the speed of light? There’s a book with the answers.
abstract: Randall Munroe, physicist and creator of Web comic xkcd, uses both absurdity and pop culture references to explain complex physical phenomena, often turning to readers of his comic for additional material; Munroe has collected scientific answers to absurd hypotheticl questions in book What If?.
lead_paragraph: How much power can one Yoda output? What happens if you tried to hit a baseball pitched at 90 percent the speed of light? There’s a book with the answers.

headline.seo: Randall Munroe, the Creator of XKCD, Explains Complexity Through Absurdity

keywords.value: What If? Serious Scientific Answers to Absurd Hypothetical Questions (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works
